Eligibility: * External or hospitalized patients with locally advanced or metastatic breast cancer who have failed with previous estrogen therapy.
Radiographic progression of the disease after previous treatment
Patients who agree to participate in this study and sign informed consent
History of hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients included (e.g. castor oil)
Patients considered unfit for study by researchers
Patients with severe liver or kidney dysfunction
Results: (Percentage of participants with side effects and/or side effects on medicines)
Delay: Adverse reactions were collected from treatment initiation until the end of the study approximately 6 months for each patient.
Title of the arm/group: Single weapon
Unit of measure: Percentage of participants Adverse reactions (ARs): 81.5 (71.3 to 89.3)
On the basis of the current South Korean label: 38.3 (27.7 to 49.7)
